title: Family tree of Muhammad
summary: This family tree is about the relatives of the Islamic prophet Muhammad known as a family member of the family of Hashim and the Qurayshs tribe which is â€˜Adnani.[1][2][3][4]  Muhammad claimed descent from Ishmael through the Hashim tribe.[lower-alpha 1] Muhammad also has Jewish ancestry through his great-grandmother, Salma bint Amr the mother of Abd al-Muttalib.[7]
